price: 86. Мре soki mokapo moko ekiti kowuta epai ya Allah été bandima na Allah mpe babunda elongo na motindami waye, okomona baye bazali na makoki nyoso ya kobunda bazali kosenga yo nzela mpo batikala elongo na baye batikali.
arabic: وَإِذَآ أُنزِلَتۡ سُورَةٌ أَنۡ ءَامِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَجَٰهِدُواْ مَعَ رَسُولِهِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡذَنَكَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلطَّوۡلِ مِنۡهُمۡ وَقَالُواْ ذَرۡنَا نَكُن مَّعَ ٱلۡقَٰعِدِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā unzilat sūratun an āminū bil-lahi wajāhidū maʿa rasūlihi is'tadhanaka ulū al-ṭawli min'hum waqālū dharnā nakun maʿa al-qāʿidīna
